artist: Hasegawa Settan; Hasegawa Settei; Text by Saitō Gesshin; Published by Suharaya Ihachi
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text and four red seals on cover; text with images, including people attending markets, festivals with large crowds, dancers, and flower and landscape viewing
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
text: Five-volume publication on the festivals in Edo with texts and illustrations. The illustrations are by Settan who was helped by Settei.
title: Records of Annual Events in the Eastern Capital, vol. 4 Autumn
